mapper.sql: menu_id, parent_id, name, url, perms, type, icon, order_num
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu (menu_id, parent_id, name, url, perms, type, icon, order_num) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update sys_menu set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select m.*,(select p.name from sys_menu p where p.menu_id = m.parent_id) as parentName from sys_menu m order by m.order_num asc
select * from sys_menu order by order_num asc limit #{index},#{count}
select * from sys_menu where type != 2 order by order_num asc
select * from sys_menu where parent_id= null order by orderNum asc
select * from sys_menu where parent_id is null order by order_num
